feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain at times heavy this evening and ending before morning then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
